title: Moment of Inertia (MoI)
text: function calculating MoI hoop. following parameters: m mass (kilograms), r radius (meter), axiss represent reference axis rotation takes place. Options geometrical axis,perp. surface center. Example: Hoop(7, 2, "geometrical axis")

title: Moment of Inertia (MoI)
text: function calculating MoI rectangular plate. following parameters: m mass (kilograms), l1 side1 length (meter), l2 side2 length(meter), axiss represent reference axis rotation takes place. Options perp. center axis,along edge Example: RectPlate(7, 2, 14, "perp. center axis")

title: Moment of Inertia (MoI)
text: function calculating MoI rod. following parameters: m mass (kilograms), l length (meter), axiss represent reference axis rotation takes place. Options perp. center,diameter surface. Example: Rod(5, 7, "diameter surface")

title: Moment of Inertia (MoI)
text: function calculating MoI solid cylinder. following parameters: m mass (kilograms), r radius (meter),l length (meter), axiss represent reference axis rotation takes place. Options geometrical axis,along surface,perp. surface center,diameter surface. Example: SolidCylinder(5, 3, 7, "geometrical axis")

title: Moment of Inertia (MoI)
text: function calculating MoI sphere. following parameters: m mass (kilograms), r radius (meter),type either solid shell, axiss represent reference axis rotation takes place. Options diameter,tangent. Example: Sphere(2, 6, "solid", "tangent")

Compute MoI of a hoop — Hoop

title: Compute MoI of a hoop — Hoop
text: moment inertia kg*m^2.

title: Compute MoI of a hoop — Hoop

what: MoI: A package for computing the moment of inertia for various 3D objects — MoI
title: MoI: A package for computing the moment of inertia for various 3D objects — MoI
text: MoI package provides several functions calculating moment inertia 3D objects.

title: MoI: A package for computing the moment of inertia for various 3D objects — MoI
text: Hoop() function computes moment inertia hoop. RectPlate() function computes moment inertia rectangular plate. Rod() function computes moment inertia rod. SolidCylinder() function computes moment inertia solid cylinder. Sphere() function computes moment inertia sphere.

what: Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
title: Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
text: Compute MoI rectangular plate

title: Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
text: m mass object kilogram. l1 length side object meter (perp. rotation axis). l2 length another side object meter. axiss reference axis rotation takes place. Options perp. center axis,along edge.

title: Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
text: moment inertia kg*m^2.

title: Compute MoI of a rectangular plate — RectPlate
